fields.name: Opening Scene
fields.sceneText: You wake up on the couch. What time is it? The door bell is ringing.

fields.name: Open Door
fields.sceneText: You get up and go to the door. Taking a breath, you open it. Standing before you is legendary singer-songwriter Tracy Chapman. She gives you one (1) reason to stay here and turns right back around.

fields.name: Investigate reason
fields.sceneText: In your hands, you see a small piece of paper, folded in half. You open it up and see a small note -'All you can save is your soul' - T

fields.name: Close Door
fields.sceneText: You close the door and sit back down on the couch. You know what you have to do. You pick up the phone to call your parents. It's been a long time since you called.
